headline: General Dynamics (GD) Secures $3.5 Billion Contract from Germany for Next-Gen Reconnaissance Vehicle
summary: General Dynamics Corporation (NYSE:GD) is among the 10 Largest Defense Stocks in 2025. On October 20, the company announced that its Europe unit had received a contract worth approximately $3.5 billion to deliver the next-generation reconnaissance vehicle for the German Army Reconnaissance Corps. The contract was commissioned by Germany’s Federal Office of Bundeswehr Equipment, Information […]
